attributes.action: Urge the PM to host a Global Hunger sumit this year.
attributes.additional_details:
15th February 2012, Save the Children and a group of academics from Oxford University revealed disturbing figures about the state of world hunger.

 A staggering 500 MILLION children are suffering from malnutrition with 2.1 Million dying a year.

Many factors are invovled but mainly the price of food, which we all know does not only effect the poor, causing families to struggle to survive.

This is an issue we all need to consider, and something that needs to be addressed by all nations for all.

Please sign this petition and ask for our Prime Minister to lead the way and create a Global Hunger summit this year in order that world leaders can come together to try and resolve this issue.

For more info

www.savethechildren.org.uk

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-17034134
